enumtype.name: org.rapidbeans.rapidenv.config.UnpackStrategy
enumtype.description: Describes the different strategies to unpack an archive file.

enum.name: simple
enum.description: Simply put a single file into the specified folder.

enum.name: removeroot
enum.description: Remove the root folder. Requires the archive to have one single root folder for all files included.

enum.name: removerootdeep
enum.description: Automatically remove one or more root folders in case there are any. Does not require the archive to have one or more root folders for all files included but in case they are there they are removed.
